subject: Empire State Building (NYC)
Running
lead_paragraph: Thomas Dold, the winner of Wednesday night’s run up the Empire State Building, is basically the sole competitor in the spotlight of the fringe sport, having won the event seven years in a row.
snippet: Thomas Dold, the winner of Wednesday night’s run up the Empire State Building, is basically the sole competitor in the spotlight of the fringe sport, having won the event seven years in a row.
